name: Live2D VR Girls
summary: With Live2D VR Girls, you can experience VR experience with lively animated characters by Live2D. It is a game aimed at telling the charm of character expression with two scenarios and easy operation.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发: Live2D Inc.
  • 发行: Live2D Inc.
  • 发行日期: 2017年12月4日
  • 售价: 免费
